text.section: On or before September 30 of each year, each warden shall submit to the Commissioner a report and statement on the affairs of the correctional facility to which the warden is appointed.

section.section: The report shall include the information required under § 3-207(a) of this subtitle as it relates to the correctional facility.
The statement shall include the information required under § 3-207(b) of this subtitle as it relates to the correctional facility.

text.section: The report and statement required by this section shall be verified by the warden of the correctional facility that is the subject of the report.
